bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I sometimes build a home in the fall. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm smaller than your thumb.
🏡 I might live in a hill or a nest.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than me.

bug.question: I can fly in the sky and have colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to visit flowers.
🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings have many colors.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. Buzz, buzz, buzz is the sound I thrive. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I have a stinger.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🌼 I collect pollen from flowers.

bug.question: I hop around and have long legs. I can be green, and some people eat me (but you probably shouldn't). What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make a chirping sound.
🌱 I eat plants.
🦵 I can jump very far.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night, a tiny light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I live where it's warm.
🔦 I use light to attract friends.
🌙 You only see me at night.

bug.question: I have eight legs and spin a web. Watch out or you might get caught in my thread! What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I'm not an insect.
🕸️ I catch my food in a special home.
🪰 Flies are my favorite snack.

bug.question: I love to eat wood, and sometimes I can be found in your house. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I build tunnels.
🏠 I'm not a welcome guest inside.
🐜 I work together with my family to find food.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl slowly. Some people think I'm lucky and I can be red with black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I eat aphids.
🟢 Gardeners like me.
⚫ My spots help camouflage me.

bug.question: I buzz loudly and bite you, leaving a red itchy bump. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I need blood to live.
🚫 I can spread diseases.
🌃 I am most active at dusk.

bug.question: I live underground and can be very loud, especially in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a buzzing sound.
🎶 I am a symbol of Summer.
🌳 I spend most of my life as a nymph under the ground.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🌱 I am a leafy vegetable.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, and I give you shade. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 Birds like to build their nests in me.
🍂 My leaves change colors in the fall.
🪵 You can make paper from me.

plant.question: I am a plant that is red, juicy, and round. You can eat me in a salad or as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used to make sauce.
☀️ I grow well in the summer.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have pretty petals and smell very sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.
🌷 I come in many different colors.
🌻 I need sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
💪 I am good for your eyes.
🥣 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I have prickly needles and stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 People decorate me for Christmas.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide things near me.
🌲 I am a type of evergreen tree.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and come in bunches. Some are green, and some are purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can make juice from me.
🍷 Some adults drink me as wine
🧺 I am a popular snack.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a big, yellow head full of seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I follow the sun during the day.
🧑‍🌾 Farmers grow me in big fields.
🫘 You can make oil and food from my seeds.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a small plant. I have a shell, and you can make tasty butter from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 Squirrels love to bury me.
🧈 I can be made into a spread for your bread.
🐘 Elephants are named after me!

plant.question: I am a plant with a hard shell that you need to crack open to eat. I grow on a tree and am very healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I can be used to make milk.
🍰 I'm often used in cakes and desserts.
🐿 Some squirrels bury me for winter.
